text: The mee sua produced here is the best.  This is an iconic brand and great product of Singapore. I still  prefer mee sua in terms of taste and texture for our local cuisine over japanese somen, korean cold noodle or taiwanese mian xian.  It amazing and cooks ever so fast like a minute. This is great to use during Chinese New Year celebrations.

Visited the factory and impressed by the sun-drying process which enhances the taste of the noodles. Gives the impression of a heritage brand that retains the charm of the past while embracing modern methods.
RE: MEE SUAN  : Salt content of the mee suan is too high. The Company ignored customer's feedback.
